channel.title: Shell Sort

item.title: Shell Sort
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

This is my Simba implementation of the Shellsort algorithm. Itâ€™s not much of a script, more so a snippet. Enjoy

[code=pascal]program new;

procedure ShellSort(var A: array of LongInt);
var
Gap, Temp, I, J: Integer;
begin
Gap := GetArrayLength(A) div 2;
while (Gap > 0) do begin
for I := Gap to High(A) do begin
J := I - Gap;
while (J >= 0) do begin
if (A[J] > A[J + Gap]) then begin
Temp := A[J];
A[J] := A[J + Gap];
A[J + Gap] := Temp;
end else Break;
DecEx(J, Gap);
end;
end;
Gap := Gap div 2;
end;
end;

var
I: Integer;
A: array of Integer;
begin
A := [6, 4, 5, 1, 2, 3, 10, 7, 9, 8];
ShellSort(A);
for I := 0 to High(A) do
WriteLn(IntToStr(A[I]));
end.[/code]
